org.osmdroid.bonuspack.utils
Class WebImageCache

java.lang.Object
  org.osmdroid.bonuspack.utils.WebImageCache

public class WebImageCache
extends java.lang.Object

Simple memory cache for handling images loaded from the web. The url is the key.

Author:
M.Kergall

Constructor Detail

WebImageCache

public WebImageCache(int maxItems)
Method Detail

get

public Bitmap get(java.lang.String url)
get the image, either from the cache, or from the web if not in the cache. Can be called by multiple threads. If 2 threads ask for the same url simultaneously, this could put the image twice in the cache. => TODO, have a "queue" of current requests.

Parameters:
url - of the image
Returns:
the image, or null if any failure.
